content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────────────
### Shared Smelting Furnaces Automation Network 
at positions (0.0, 0.0), (5.0, 0.0), (2.5, 0.5) & (2.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace for Iron Smelting at (0.0, 0.0) paired with a Burner Inserter at (1.5, 0.5) and a Dedicated Output Chest at (0.5, 2.5)
• Stone Furnace for Copper Smelting at (5.0, 0.0) with a Burner Inserter at (3.5, 0.5)
• Common Input Chest (Wooden Chest) at (2.5, 0.5)
• New Feeder Inserter (Feeder Inserter) at (2.5, -0.5) with pickup at (2.5, -1.5) and drop at (2.5, 0.5)
• Transport Belt Connection linking mining output to the feeder inserter

### Iron Ore Mining Automation Setup 
at (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
• Burner Mining Drill at (-15.0, -50.0) with output drop at (-14.5, -48.5)
• Drill Inserter at (-13.5, -47.5)
• Sink Chest (Wooden Chest) at (-11.5, -46.5)
• Sink Inserter (Burner Inserter) at (-10.5, -46.5) with pickup at (-9.5, -46.5) and drop at (-11.5, -46.5)
• Transport Belt Connection linking the drill drop to the sink inserter pickup

### Automation Research Lab 
at (5.5, 5.5) with Updated Electrical Connection
Consists of:
• Lab at (5.5, 5.5) (status: NO_POWER; research on Automation in progress)
• Electricity Network formed by Small Electric Poles (ElectricityGroup id=1281) connecting the lab to power sources

### Water Supply System for Power Generation with Updated Steam Engine Placement
Consists of:
• Boiler at (8.0, 20.5) now updated to status FULL_OUTPUT (energy ≈32000.0; fuel insertion of 5 wood completed; fluid box contains water [200 at 15°] and steam [200 at 165°])
• Offshore Pump at (0.5, 30.5) (status: WORKING)
• Steam Engines:
 – Steam Engine at (8.5, 17.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”)
 – Steam Engine at (11.5, 20.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED; unchanged from earlier configuration)
 – Steam Engine at (13.5, 17.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED; a newly crafted engine repositioned unsuccessfully toward the Boiler)
• Pipe connection attempts between the Boiler and all Steam Engines remain unsuccessful despite fueling adjustments

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Pipe Connection and Alignment:
 – Ensure pipe endpoints on connected entities are properly aligned, in close proximity, and free of obstructions. Reposition entities or clear adjacent blockages if connection attempts fail.

• Placement Restrictions for Steam Engines:
 – Validate that chosen buildable areas fully satisfy placement criteria before attempting to place or reposition a Steam Engine. Pre-check available space via API returns to avoid placement failures.

• Incorrect Property Access:
 – Access object properties (such as a buildable area’s center) directly rather than invoking them as functions to prevent TypeErrors.

• Consistent API Usage and Inventory Verification:
 – Continue using standardized, lowercase prototype names and correct attribute access to avoid reference or type mismatches.
 – Confirm required items are present in inventory before initiating placement or connection operations.

• Preceding Operational Checks (from earlier reports):
 – Verify that furnace outputs are cleared before fuel insertion.
 – Ensure all sub-ingredients are available prior to crafting operations.
